subject: Indigenous-Languages
generalLearningOutcomes: Develop foundational knowledge and skills in Indigenous Languages
Apply Indigenous Languages concepts to solve real-world problems
Demonstrate critical thinking and analytical skills in Indigenous Languages
Communicate effectively using Indigenous Languages terminology and concepts

subStrands.name: Introduction to Concepts
specificLearningOutcomes: Understand basic Indigenous Languages principles and concepts
Identify key terminology and vocabulary in Indigenous Languages
Apply fundamental skills and knowledge in Indigenous Languages
keyInquiryQuestions: What is Indigenous Languages and why is it important?
How do we use Indigenous Languages in everyday life?
What are the fundamental principles of Indigenous Languages?
